name: Rep. Mike Levin

Myth: Eliminating noncompetitive leasing will hurt taxpayers and states.

Fact: Noncompetitive leasing is an outdated process that lets companies acquire vast tracks of public lands for less than a cup of ‚òï.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text:
Myth: Companies disclose enough information, and citizens have more than enough ways to engage in the leasing process.

Fact: Companies nominate public lands for auction anonymously and with no fee. My bill fixes this.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text:
Myth: Restricting U.S. oil & gas drilling is worse for the environment.

Fact: Reducing consumption of fossil fuels is the best thing we can do to protect our planet. We should focus on clean energy solutions instead of drilling for more oil.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: I‚Äôve said it before and I‚Äôll say it again: Even one homeless veteran is one too many, and we have a moral obligation to make robust federal investments in programs to help get veterans off our streets.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: And it includes the Bill Mulder Transition Improvement Act, a bill I introduced with @RepArrington to make to make the transition process easier for servicemembers returning to civilian life.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: It includes the Veterans Economic Recovery Act, a bill I introduced with @DrPhilRoe to create a rapid retraining program for unemployed veterans and reservists.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: It includes my Housing for Women Veterans Act, a bill I introduced with @RepBrianFitz to require the VA to complete an analysis of its programs that provide assistance to women veterans who are homeless to identify the areas in which such programs are failing to meet their needs.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: It includes the Reducing Veteran Homelessness Act, a bill I introduced with @GOPLeader to ensure that homeless veterans and their families receive the resources and services they deserve by filling gaps in HUD-VASH case management.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: It includes the Veteran HOUSE Act, a bill I co-led with @RepScottPeters to expand the HUD-VASH program to homeless veterans discharged under conditions other-than-honorable.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: It includes the Homeless Veteran Coronavirus Response Act, a bill I introduced with my friend @RepGusBilirakis to expand and strengthen VA services for homeless veterans during the COVID-19 pandemic.

name: Rep. Mike Levin
tweet_text: Today, the House took a significant step in making sure homeless and unemployed veterans have the support they deserve. I was proud to lead the DELIVER Act, major legislation that includes 6 of my bipartisan bills to help get veterans back on their feet. https://t.co/uN4GPqQBLn
